0.post_text: To Lewis Pugh, nothing is as exciting as diving into the water. But it's accomplishing an epic swimming expedition that gives him the drive to move on to greater challenges. What was your biggest accomplishment? http://bit.ly/BMW_LewisPugh #LewisPugh #BusinessAthlete #BMW #PML

1.post_text:
Lewis Pugh is a man of vision in his quest to restore the health of the oceans. He sought to raise awareness by becoming the first person to complete a long-distance swim in all seven seas. 
Do you have a quest in life? http://bit.ly/BMW_LewisPugh #LewisPugh #BusinessAthlete #BMW #PML

15.post_text:
Performance Motors wishes one and all a Happy Lunar New Year filled with prosperity, abundance and good fortune.
 
May your every journey with your BMW be filled with happiness!

16.post_text:
Ever wanted to go on an off-road adventure in one of the most scenic countries in the world, driving your favorite BMW?
 
Join BMW on the ultimate Safari Trip to Namibia, Africa, combining horse-riding and an off-road experience in our award-winning BMW X5 from the 28th May 2017 to 5th June 2017. 
 
To embark on this once-in-a-lifetime experience, prices start at €5,390* (est. S$8,190).
Only limited spaces are available.
Call +65 6838 9688 or email drivingexperience@bmw.de to reserve your slot now!
 
 
*Double Room without flight, travel cancellation, health insurance and visa.

18.post_text:
Thank you all who came down to visit the Performance Motors Parkway Parade Roadshow where our seven-seater family car, the BMW 2 Series Gran Tourer was showcased. It is the only premium compact MPV that fits the whole family, and more. No guesses why so many families dropped by to check out the exclusive deals at the Roadshow!
 
If you missed this Parkway Parade Roadshow, you can always drop by Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road to find out more.
